actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, June 16, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, June 16, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN90:
        Julie Rikelman, of Massachusetts, to be United States Circuit Judge for the First Circuit

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 43. Record Vote Number: 166
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Bennet, at  7:43 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
